front.title: IPv6 Router Advertisement Prefix Delegation Option

abstract.t: This document defines the Prefix Delegation (PD) option used todelegate IPv6 address space to simple IPv6 sites. The PD option,which lists the global prefixes that a site may use to number itsnetwork, is attached to IPv6 Neighbor Discovery Router Advertisementmessages that are sent across a point-to-point link from a provider'srouter to a site's border router. This document defines themechanism by which a site router processes the PD option andconfigures each of its attached links allowing hosts within the siteto obtain global addresses using address autoconfiguration.
